snippet: The State Board of Education voted not to go ahead with revised standards that expressed doubt about widely held views of climate change.
abstract: West Virginia education officials vote to take back their changed version of Next Generation Science Standards; standards voiced doubts about generally held views of climate change.
lead_paragraph: The State Board of Education voted not to go ahead with revised standards that expressed doubt about widely held views of climate change.

headline.main: West Virginia Withdraws Altered Climate Curriculum
headline.print_headline: West Virginia Withdraws Altered Climate Curriculum
